    Virtual Data Centers resources.

    Base URL: /compute/vcenter-data-centers

      • listByVcenter

        public java.util.List<NamedRelatedResourceRep> listByVcenter(java.net.URI vcenterId,
                                                    java.net.URI tenantId)
        Lists the datacenters filtered by the tenants for the given vCenter by ID.

        API Call: GET /compute/vcenters/{vcenterId}/vcenter-data-centers?tenant={tenantId}

        Parameters:
        vcenterId - the ID of the vCenter.
        Returns:
        the list of datacenter references.

      • getByVcenter

        public java.util.List<VcenterDataCenterRestRep> getByVcenter(java.net.URI vcenterId)
        Gets the list of datacenters for the given vCenter by ID. This is a convenience method for: getByRefs(listByVcenter(vcenterId))
        Parameters:
        vcenterId - the ID of the vCenter.
        Returns:
        the list of datacenters.

      • create

        public VcenterDataCenterRestRep create(java.net.URI vcenterId,
                              VcenterDataCenterCreate input)
        Creates a datacenter within the given vCenter by ID.

        API Call: POST /compute/vcenters/{vcenterId}/vcenter-data-centers

        Parameters:
        vcenterId - the ID of the vCenter.
        input - the create configuration.
        Returns:
        the newly created datacenter.

      • update

        public VcenterDataCenterRestRep update(java.net.URI id,
                              VcenterDataCenterUpdate input)
        Updates the given datacenter by ID.

        API Call: PUT /compute/vcenter-data-centers/{id}

        Parameters:
        id - the ID of the datacenter to update.
        input - the update configuration.
        Returns:
        the updated datacenter.

      • deactivate

        public Task<VcenterDataCenterRestRep> deactivate(java.net.URI id)
        Deactivates the given datacenter by ID.

        API Call: POST /compute/vcenter-data-centers/{id}/deactivate

        Parameters:
        id - the ID of the datacenter to deactivate.
        Returns:
        a task for monitoring the progress of the operation.

      • deactivate

        public Task<VcenterDataCenterRestRep> deactivate(java.net.URI id,
                                        boolean detachStorage)
        Deactivates a data center.

        API Call: POST /compute/vcenter-data-centers/{id}/deactivate?detach-storage={detachStorage}

        Parameters:
        id - the ID of the data center to deactivate.
        detachStorage - if true, will first detach storage.
        Returns:
        a task for monitoring the progress of the operation.

      • detachStorage

        public Task<VcenterDataCenterRestRep> detachStorage(java.net.URI id)
        Detaches storage from a data center.

        API Call: POST /compute/vcenter-data-centers/{id}/detach-storage

        Parameters:
        id - the ID of the data center.
        Returns:
        a task for monitoring the progress of the operation.

      • createVcenterCluster

        public Task<VcenterDataCenterRestRep> createVcenterCluster(java.net.URI dataCenterId,
                                                  VcenterClusterParam clusterParam)
        Create a vCenter cluster in a datacenter.

        API Call: POST /compute/vcenter-data-centers/{id}/create-vcenter-cluster

        Parameters:
        dataCenterId - the id of the data center.
        clusterParam - VcenterClusterParam id of the selected cluster
        Returns:
        a task for monitoring the progress of the operation.

      • updateVcenterCluster

        public Task<VcenterDataCenterRestRep> updateVcenterCluster(java.net.URI dataCenterId,
                                                  VcenterClusterParam clusterParam)
        Update and existing vCenter cluster.

        API Call: PUT /compute/vcenter-data-centers/{id}/update-vcenter-cluster

        Parameters:
        dataCenterId - the id of the data center.
        clusterParam - VcenterClusterParam id of the selected cluster
        Returns:
        a task for monitoring the progress of the operation.
